## RumInitConfiguration.excludedActivityUrls property

A list of request origins ignored when computing the page activity. See \[How page activity is calculated\](https://docs.datadoghq.com/real\_user\_monitoring/browser/monitoring\_page\_performance/\#how-page-activity-is-calculated) for further information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
excludedActivityUrls?: MatchOption[] | undefined;
```
